front.title: Metered Service Information eXchange Protocol Specification Version 1.2

abstract.t: This document defines MSIX, a protocol that enables transmission ofservice definitions and service usage information from client toserver. Services can be defined dynamically such that a meteringserver can become capable of handling new metered service typesduring the normal course of business without need for recompilationor reconfiguration. Service usage description semantics supporttransactional data submission. Support for both simple and compoundtransactions is provided.
